## ğŸ› ï¸ æœ¬åœ°éƒ¨ç½²

#### 1. å…‹éš†é¡¹ç›®

```bash
git clone https://gitee.com/chang1o/recipe-tracker
cd recipe-tracker
```

#### 2. é…ç½®æ•°æ®åº“

<details open>
<summary><b>æ–¹å¼ä¸€ï¼šæœ¬åœ° MySQL æ•°æ®åº“</b></summary>

```bash
# 1. ç¡®ä¿ MySQL æœåŠ¡å·²å¯åŠ¨

# 2. åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“è¡¨ç»“æ„
mysql -u root -p < src/main/resources/schema.sql

# 3. å¯¼å…¥åˆå§‹æ•°æ®
mysql -u root -p < src/main/resources/init_data.sql

# 4. ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ src/main/resources/database.properties
```

```properties
db.username=root
db.password=your_password
```

</details>

<details>
<summary><b>æ–¹å¼äºŒï¼šäº‘æ•°æ®åº“</b></summary>

ç¼–è¾‘ `src/main/java/com/chang1o/util/DBUtil.java`ï¼š

```diff
- props.load(DBUtil.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("database.properties"));
+ props.load(DBUtil.class.getClassLoader().getResourceAsStream("clouddatabase.properties"));
```

> TiDB äº‘æ•°æ®åº“ä½äº AWS æ—¥æœ¬åŒºåŸŸï¼Œå­˜åœ¨ç½‘ç»œå»¶è¿Ÿ

</details>

#### 3. é…ç½® [Kimi API Key](https://platform.moonshot.cn/)

ä¸ºå¯ç”¨ AI åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œéœ€è¦é…ç½® Kimi API Keyï¼š

<details open>
<summary><b>æ–¹å¼ä¸€ï¼šé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶</b></summary>

1. å¤åˆ¶ç¤ºä¾‹é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š
```bash
cp src/main/resources/api.properties.example src/main/resources/api.properties
```

2. ç¼–è¾‘ `src/main/resources/api.properties` å¡«å…¥æ‚¨çš„ API Keyï¼š
```properties
kimi.api.key=sk-*
```
</details>

<details>
<summary><b>æ–¹å¼äºŒï¼šç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡</b></summary>

æ‚¨ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è®¾ç½®ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡ `KIMI_API_KEY`ï¼Œå®ƒå°†è¦†ç›–é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­çš„è®¾ç½®ï¼š

```bash
export KIMI_API_KEY=sk-*
```

</details>

#### 4. æ„å»ºä¸è¿è¡Œ

```bash
# ç¼–è¯‘é¡¹ç›®
mvn clean compile
```

| è¿è¡Œæ–¹å¼ | å‘½ä»¤ | é€‚ç”¨åœºæ™¯ |
|:--------:|:------|:---------:|
| Unix | `chmod +x run.sh && ./run.sh` | å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯• |
| Windows | `run.bat` | å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯• |
| Maven | `mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="com.chang1o.recipe.Main"` | å¼€å‘è°ƒè¯• |
